website_summaries.verdict: A multi-function call that will perform well for experienced hunters.
pros: Has variable calls to work throughout the season
A nice sliding knob allows you to easily switch grunts
Designed to eliminate ice buildup in cold weather
Can be very loud, but still has the capacity to produce soft sounds
Includes a snort wheeze sound maker
cons: The slider function requires practice to master and can be a little tricky to get it into position for the right noise the first time

customer_reviews.title: Good, loud grunt for new hunters
customer_reviews.text: Not the most realistic grunt sound, but very loud Carries through the woods more of a management buck call that a monster buck... not a deep grunt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Realistic Grunts
customer_reviews.text: The grunt sounds are realistic and plenty loud enough. Very easy to use and looks pretty darn neat to. The addition of the snort wheeze is a big plus to. The rubber tube can be used to grunt in different directions without having to move around a lot. I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful call
customer_reviews.text: Both of these deer could not resist this call. My deer was very old and mature and came in on a line following my 1 snort weeze and a few grunts. My boys deer came in on a line with 3 snort weezes and several drunts. His deer left 5 does to come see where the call was coming from. I also have some video of his kill.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome call!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this so I can’t speak to the durability of it (but it seems well made). I can speak to the ease of use and GREAT sound you get from the call. It’s easy to control the volume and tone, which can be challenging with other reed calls. The tube allows for fluctuation in calling which makes it sounds more realistic. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well. Sometimes the noise it produces is off
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Sometimes the noise it produces is off, so you have to slide the slider back and forth to get it to make the proper noise. It's quite a hassle when your in the woods and go to make a call and the first call you make is way off in sound.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: No deer hunter should be without this call! Great product, great price, great construction/material, and well made. You can make multiple calls with this one call... buck, doe, and fawn. Would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Doe Inferno

customer_reviews.title: Dad is STOKED.
customer_reviews.text: My dad was tickled to death when he opened this Christmas present. He's a long time hunter & he doesn't seem to always get the "new all in one cool thing" - he usually rigs what he has together; well, this solves that issue! He's a happy hunter!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Still in test phase
customer_reviews.text: Giving this four stars, just do to the fact I haven't seen a deer since I have used this. With that being said, I like the fact that you can switch to doe, fawn, and buck grunt and sounds great. Might be user error on my part, will keep using it to see results, and update to five stars if something happens.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Napolsky

customer_reviews.title: Realistic, can change tones of grunts, great value, realistic
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, called in several bucks with this, got many does attention as well with doe bleats and fawn bleats. Eventually grunted at a group of bucks during the rut in early November and a big 8pt came full speed 120 yds straight at my stand, shot him at 10 yds with my bow when he stopped. Looking forward to my second season with this!
customer_reviews.author: JPE

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: After using it a few times the pieces begin to come apart and the o ring will not hold without holding it tight to your mouth as you flex the end. It Messed up a few calls but it got the 2 star because it didnt scare anything away with the messed up calls due to not being sealed at the o ring
customer_reviews.author: nicholas harritt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had read this call is difficult to use but I haven’t had that experience. This is my first grunt cal and after watching a few pros make noises I was able to imitate pretty easily. Especially the snort wheeze.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Discko

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Called in a nice 8pt with this. It is a lot louder than my other grunt calls. I don't like the sound of the doe or fawn call on it. The snort/ wheeze isn't loud enough but does work.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great brought the big one in to shooting range.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: One call does it all
customer_reviews.text: This call sounds great and is easy to use, the slide system to change between Fawn to buck works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Calkins

customer_reviews.title: Multiple calls
customer_reviews.text: Does many different calls. Decently made. Would recommend. Couldn't use due to Northern California fires.
customer_reviews.author: NorCal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Realistic sounds.......bring in that monster buck!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Realistic sound that works to call in trophy bucks. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan F.

customer_reviews.title: All in one.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get to use it much during the rut, but sounds for the most part realisti.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Sometimes sticks in the previous position though.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Called in a 8 point
customer_reviews.text: I love it helped me call in a 8 point buck
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Sounds real, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Buck, Doe, Fawn in one call, no freezing, realistic vocalizations. Reasonable price. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: joejv4

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, quality seems good, convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, quality seems good, convenient that all sounds are in one call
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good very happy with the product. Basically replaces two lures.
customer_reviews.author: Ty D

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: If I would ever lose it I would order another one. Called in an 8 point during later archery season.
customer_reviews.author: marc Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great ... only tool you need ... maybe some antlers.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Laymon

customer_reviews.title: Great deer call
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, all purpose deer call. All weather, volume control, realistic sound, to include a snort wheeze. It works!
customer_reviews.author: luther king

customer_reviews.title: It works:
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use: Creates realistic grunts and doe bleets that elicits deer interest and draws them to the source.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Great product. For great price
customer_reviews.text: Used this year and called in a 9 point. Awesome quality.
customer_reviews.author: Caity

customer_reviews.title: talking deer lingo
customer_reviews.text: works like a charm, called back 2 nice bucks that i spooked by mistake. took out this call, did a grunt and thay came right back into bow range
customer_reviews.author: Adam Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Called in a couple bucks with this call. Very nice sounding and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Adams

customer_reviews.text: Tone adjustment isn’t realistic, not deep enough for old bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like. Easy to use. Worth the time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon r

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a hunter
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift for my dad and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality call
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great call just isn’t as loud as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find a listing for Flextone's 'Extractor' model, so I ordered this just to give it a shot. Opened the box and found an Extractor inside. Not sure if this was a happy coincidence or just a listing error, but I'll take it. Incredibly easy to use and great sound quality. Video link for the model I received: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the sound is amazing the slide is a little stiff but i'm sure ...
customer_reviews.text: the sound is amazing the slide is a little stiff but i'm sure thats because its new. I've already brought deer in with it great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Work's Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, appreciate the flexibility it allows while in the field!
customer_reviews.author: MisterHunter

customer_reviews.title: Loud, nice deep grunt.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent call ! Very loud compared to others on the market with the mod slide. Definitely grabs a bucks attention at a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Johnson

product_meta.title: Flextone Headhunter Extractor, Antler Color, 2.00 x 6.00 x 12.00 inches (FG-DEER-00063)
feature_bullets: X-Glide Slide Adjustment for variable tones
